Text.Page:
The sheer number of gilgash guardians wandering the front is demoralizing the troops. Who can blame them? Those things are massive and deadly.

Time for a little attrition. Take a squad out and kill the gilgashes.

Dismissed.

I wandered through the mess line a little while ago. They're talking about your exploits. That's a good sign.

They're laughing more now. That's a better sign. Thanks.
